desc: Tiresias Mist is a award-winning spray that enables growers to create feminized seeds. The product is owned and distributed by Phoenician Nutrients, LLC, which is based out of Scottsdale, AZ. Tiresias {ty-ree’-see-uhs} Mist was the result of research with the goal in mind of standardizing a treatment method to produce

layout.text: Feminized Seed Spray for Plants – Tiresias Mist
